reviewText: awesome for semi pro photographers like me. you get the whole package: lots of marketing advices, samples of pictures, technical advices, live photoshoots.. add up with the nice outgoing way of being of brett and you get a nice home photography workshop.. definitely helped me improving as a professional, it is good that the great ones stop a little bit to share some of their knowledge with the others :) totally recommended

I ordered this dvd set because I want to take my wedding photography to the next level. The advice that Brett gives is really invaluable, theres nothing much else that could be added other then to get out there and shoot. Its a great purchase. Jurgen www.jurgenphotography.com

I wasn't too sure on wedding photography until I watched this dvd.
Brett is brilliant at explaining everything from marketing to taking the shots and what shots work best. His work is absolutely amazing and I am very inspired.
Cant wait for the next dvd Brett.

As somebody starting out on the road to becoming a pro-photographer or at least with dreams of being one this DVD was simply amazing. The attention to marketing, pricing, and general "if you want to stand out from the crowd then do this because I am" advice is staggering. Do not be fooled though, if you are looking for a DVD that has 6 hours of "stand a bride like this and you are guaranteed an awesome shot" you will be disappointed if however you want to see how one of the best approaches each situation and take in and adapt to your own shooting then you will get some serious value from this DVD.

I have no doubt that I will be watching this set at least a few times more as the first time you cannot simply take it in. Big, and I mean huge, warning though! I almost guarantee that before you have got to the end of the DVD you would have checked out the prices of some seriously high end kit because you will be motivated to get to the level that makes it worthwhile to purchase it, so just watch your camera expenses grow!

Brett takes time to talk about everything! I felt like I was actually there at the workshop ( and I really wanted to be). Great for all as Brett talks about the business side as well as the creative side.
